name: Geekwhat Design
overview:
Geekwhat Design (geekwhatdesign.com) is a web design studio comprised of a seriously fun team of geeks that are experts in web design and development. Located in the heart of Soho in New York City, the company was founded in 2011 by male model and published recording artist Tony Chung. Most notable among the company’s services are high end Wordpress customization and User Interface design. With high profile clients in both fashion and entertainment sectors, Geekwhat Design is quickly becoming one of the top web design studios of its kind in New York City.

Services offered:

• Website design / User interface design

As one of our clients, your web presence is our utmost priority. To ensure originality and to set you apart from your competitors, we design new websites from the ground up. From buttons to colors to mouse-over actions, we create and design everything that happens in the browser from scratch.

• Marketing / branding design

Your company needs a voice and we’re here to help you design materials that represent you with a strong and professional voice. From Google ad packages to print flyers, we can help you create eye-catching tools to effectively promote your products.

• Web development

In today’s society, websites have become increasingly interactive. In following the latest technologies, our websites will allow you and your customers to connect and communicate effectively. Your site will be consistent across all popular browser platforms and compliant with up-to-date worldwide coding standards.

• Hosting / Domain registration

If you are interested in starting a new website, we offer domain registration of URLs (e.g. www.mydomain.com) as well as server hosting for all your website files. Our plans include monthly maintenance, 99.99% uptime, and tech support. Our goal is to ensure that your site is running smoothly on our servers 24-7. Contact us for more on getting started with hosting.
